news.description: In 2011, Aden Boru, a Borana pastoralist in northeast Kenya, lost 12 of his 60 cows to drought.
news.title: As droughts worsen, Kenyan herders revive ancient grazing system

news.description: Belasan rumah di Desa Pintu Langit, Kecamatan Angkola Julu, Kota Padangsidimpuan, rusak berat akibat diterjang angin puting beliung, Kamis (24/6/2016) sore.
news.title: Belasan Rumah di Padangsidimpuan Rusak Diterjang Puting Beliung

news.description: The warrant is the first to be levelled against a Volkswagen executive anywhere in the world after the firm admitted in September 2015 to using software to falsify pollution tests on some diesel cars, spurring legal action in the United States, Germany, South Korea and elsewhere.
news.title: S Korea arrests VW boss over Dieselgate

news.description: Gempa berkekuatan 5,1 SR di Kendawangan, Ketapang, Jumat (24/6) sekitar 07.41.36 WIB berpotensi akan terjadi susulan, namun terjadi hanya dalam skala kecil.
news.title: BREAKING NEWS: Waspada Gempa Susulan Meski Hanya Skala Kecil

news.description: Provinsi Kalimantan Tengah belum bisa dikatakan aman dari gempa.
news.title: BREAKING NEWS : BMKG Kalteng Sebut Wilayah Kalbar Masuk Dalam Patahan

news.description: The Competition and Markets Authority has overridden the concerns of one of its key experts by ditching plans for a temporary blanket ceiling on how much energy firms can charge and opting instead for helping customers switch to cheaper deals.
news.title: Energy bills: plans for blanket ceiling on how much firms can charge ditched
